All 0 values in the input are transformed to 0 in the output.
The output consists of a 3x3 tiling of blocks derived from the input.
hypotheses: Replace all 1s with 2s, keep 0s as 0s, and tile the resulting grid 3x3.
Replace all 1s with 2s, keep 0s as 0s, and expand the grid by repeating each row and column three times.

selected_rule: Replace all 1s with 2s, keep 0s as 0s, and tile the resulting grid 3x3.
